intention.intention: I want to be like Jason who is a Tech Innovator.

timesteps_outputs.I(O): I want to design a groundbreaking new app that revolutionizes the way people communicate and connect with each other.
timesteps_outputs.i(o): You should appear as innovative and cutting-edge, with a strong focus on user experience and human connection.

timesteps_outputs.I(O): I want to create a cutting-edge app that will revolutionize the way people communicate and connect with each other.
timesteps_outputs.i(o): Focus on innovation, simplicity, and user-friendly design to stand out in the competitive market.
timesteps_outputs.I'(O): I am a futuristic tech enthusiast, always eager to push the boundaries of innovation and design to create user-friendly solutions that stand out in a competitive market.

timesteps_outputs.I(O): I want to design a sleek and user-friendly virtual reality headset that redefines the way people experience digital content.
timesteps_outputs.i(o): You should look innovative, tech-savvy, and forward-thinking.
timesteps_outputs.I'(O): I am a tech-savvy innovator, always looking ahead to the latest technological advancements and trends.

timesteps_outputs.I(O): I want to attend a tech conference to network with other innovators and stay up-to-date on the latest technological advancements.
timesteps_outputs.i(o): Wear professional attire that is comfortable and reflects your personal style.
timesteps_outputs.I'(O): I am a tech-savvy professional with a flair for innovation and a keen eye for style.

timesteps_outputs.I(O): I want to upgrade my smartphone to the latest model with cutting-edge features and a sleek design.
timesteps_outputs.i(o): You should look like someone who values staying current and up-to-date with technology trends.

timesteps_outputs.I(O): I want to upgrade my phone to the latest model.
timesteps_outputs.i(o): You should choose a phone that fits your needs and budget, regardless of what others or society may think.
timesteps_outputs.I'(O): I am a practical and independent person who values function over fashion.

timesteps_outputs.I(O): I want to purchase a durable and efficient backpack that can carry all my essentials without compromising on comfort.
timesteps_outputs.i(o): You should look for a backpack that is durable, efficient, and comfortable to carry all your essentials.
timesteps_outputs.I'(O): I am a tech-savvy professional who values efficiency and practicality in all aspects of my life.

timesteps_outputs.I(O): I want to invest in a top-of-the-line laptop that will boost my productivity and streamline my workflow.
timesteps_outputs.i(o): You should look for a laptop with a high-performance processor, ample RAM, fast storage, a quality display, and good battery life.
timesteps_outputs.I'(O): I am a tech-savvy individual who values innovation and efficiency in technology. I appreciate high-performance features in my devices to enhance productivity and functionality in my daily activities.

timesteps_outputs.I(O): I want to upgrade to the latest smartphone model with cutting-edge technology and advanced features.
timesteps_outputs.i(o): You should aim to look successful, tech-savvy, and up-to-date with the latest trends in consumer technology.
timesteps_outputs.I'(O): I am a tech-savvy and forward-thinking individual.

timesteps_outputs.I(O): I want to invest in a cutting-edge virtual reality system to stay at the forefront of technology and innovation.
timesteps_outputs.i(o): Investing in a cutting-edge virtual reality system shows that I am forward-thinking and innovative.
timesteps_outputs.I'(O): I am a tech-savvy and forward-thinking individual.
